entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and local blowing snow beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
